column4: is there a software which can find the song name and artist name from internet automatically ? ( Feature: like Winamp 5.x "Auto-tag" ) . Amarok had this feature as a plug-in on 1.x but on 2.x is not supported. i don't want to turn on 1.x version of amarok because it will not supported anymore (at least it will not supported) (also MusicBrainz Picard is givving the wrong results).
ı gooled it every day. ı am not never asking question here without researching...
